name: Burried Connections
description:
An FPS where you fight aliens and Re-Connect with the dark and horrific truth of an ancient planet. You are space explorers in this action, looter/shooter, multiplayer fps.

Complete:

Various monster enemies

Abandoned Planet World

Rich Left Wing Story

First Person Shooter Mechanics

Epics Battles To Unearth The Mystery of This Planet

Story Rich intro and closure

In progress:

Photon Capable Multiplayer Split Screen
